subject: Another prototype diode device for EVP capture
author: M.A. Coletta (Mike)
full_text:
Greetings fellow researchers,

Well... I've completed another prototype diode device for EVP capture.  
This one I put in a clear case so you can see the circuit.  It is 
similar to the first one I designed (Device #1) and built, except this 
one (Device #2) uses a slightly different coil with ferrite core and 
different diodes. Their breakdown voltage is less than the first I used.

You can see pictures of it here:
http://www.ufogeek.com/mikes_diode_evp_device.htm

It's on the webpage, below Device #1.

The audio from my first test is here:
http://www.ufogeek.com/sessions/diodeplasma2.WMA

Thanks,
- Mike C. (UFO Geek)
